content.question: A reporter responsible for the food section of a magazine investigated the belief that grocery stores sell beef at a higher price in the fall than in the spring. The reporter selected independent random samples of grocery-store beef prices in November and April and computed the mean and standard deviation for the samples. Which of the following are the correct null and alternative hypotheses for the reporter’s investigation, where <math alttext="mu sub F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> represents the mean price of beef in the fall and <math alttext="mu sub S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> represents the mean price of beef in the spring?

choices.label: <math alttext="H sub 0: x bar sub F minus x bar sub S equals 0. H sub a: x bar sub F minus x bar sub S is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: x bar sub F minus x bar sub S equals 0. H sub a: x bar sub F minus x bar sub S is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mover accent="true"><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub F minus mu sub S equals 0. H sub a: mu sub F minus mu sub S is not equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>≠</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub F minus mu sub S equals 0. H sub a: mu sub F minus mu sub S is less than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="H sub 0: mu sub F minus mu sub S equals 0. H sub a: mu sub F minus mu sub S is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

H sub a: mu sub F minus mu sub S is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtable columnalign="left"><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>a</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>:</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mrow><mi>μ</mi></mrow><mrow><mtext>S</mtext></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.8: Setting Up a Test for the Difference of Two Population Means

skill.text: Skill 1.F: Identify null and alternative hypotheses.
